newsitem.title: USA: NexMed starts two clinical trials in China.
newsitem.headline: NexMed starts two clinical trials in China.

text.p: NexMed Inc, development stage drug company, on Friday said it has started two clinical studies of medical products in China.
One study involves a phase II/III 500 patient study on a proprietary topical cream based on of alprostadil and designed to treat male erectile dysfunction.
The second is a pilot study on VIRATROL, a patented medical device to treat herpes simplex. The company expects to conclude the studies by the end of second quarter, 1997.
The Beijing office of Innapharma, a company based in Upper Saddle River, New Jersey, will help manage the studies.
